  • Method Details

    • hash

      public java.nio.ByteBuffer hash()
      Description copied from class: Entry
      Returns the 32-byte hash of the contents. This is a straight digest of the contents. A subclass may override in order to exploit a more structured strategy for computing this hash.
      Overrides:
      hash in class Entry
      Returns:
      a read-only, 32-byte wide buffer

    • reNumber

      public Entry.RuleBased reNumber​(long rowNumber)
      Description copied from class: Entry
      Returns this entry, but with a new row number.
      Overrides:
      reNumber in class Entry
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - ≥ 1
      Returns:
      a new instance of this class if rowNumber is not the same as this instance; this instance, otherwise.
